snippet: With regulators fining five major banks $4.25 billion for conspiring to manipulate foreign-currency trading, the Dow and S.&P. 500 fell while the Nasdaq inched up.
abstract: Big banks weigh on stock market, tugging major indexes back from string of closing highs.
lead_paragraph: With regulators fining five major banks $4.25 billion for conspiring to manipulate foreign-currency trading, the Dow and S.&P. 500 fell while the Nasdaq inched up.

headline.main: Markets Slip Slightly on News of Global Bank Fines
headline.print_headline: Markets Slip Slightly on News of Global Bank Fines
